meanings.definition: The condition or status of being self-governing or independent, especially in reference to a church or religious organization.
meanings.sent1: The autocephalies of the local church allowed it to make decisions independently.
meanings.sent2: The autocephalies of the organization ensured it could operate freely.
meanings.sent3: The autocephalies of the church made it the boss of its own decisions.
meanings.sent4: The autocephalies of the group gave it the power to govern itself.
meanings.sent5: The autocephalies of the community church were evident in its ability to govern itself.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of having its own head or leader, separate from external authority.
meanings.sent1: The autocephalies of the team allowed them to choose their own leader.
meanings.sent2: The autocephalies of the department ensured it had its own leader.
meanings.sent3: The autocephalies of the club meant they could pick their own boss.
meanings.sent4: The autocephalies of the group set them apart with their own leader.
meanings.sent5: The autocephalies of the organization was clear in its independent leadership.
